explains: v. （正式）宣告，（公开）声明；强调，声称；（标志或通知）宣传，告知；清楚表明，显示

sentences.en: The details of her skeleton proclaim her human affinity.
sentences.cn: 她骨骼的细节证明了她与人类的密切关系。

sentences.en: They are no longer willing to debate whether photography is or is not a fine art, except to proclaim that their own work is not involved with art.
sentences.cn: 他们不再愿意争论摄影是否是一门艺术，只是宣称自己的作品与艺术无关。

sentences.en: I will proclaim it, yea, I will sell it.
sentences.cn: 我不但要宣扬它，还要推销它。
